                     String defaultValue)
        Gets the domino ini var.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getDominoProps

        public static InputStream getDominoProps(int fileType,
                         String fileLoc)
        Gets properties file and returns as an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        fileType - int passed to switch statement.
        1 -> name of a properties file in this package
        2 -> literal path of a properties file
        3 -> relative path of a properties file, relative to Domino directory
        fileLoc - String filepath location of properties file
        Returns:
        InputStream (or BufferedInputStream) of properties file content
